subject: Football
Christmas
lead_paragraph: In the N.F.L.’s longest game, on Christmas Day of 1971, the Dolphins defeated the Chiefs, 27-24, in a double-overtime divisional playoff, sparking fond and bitter memories 41 years later.
snippet: In the N.F.L.’s longest game, on Christmas Day of 1971, the Dolphins defeated the Chiefs, 27-24, in a double-overtime divisional playoff, sparking fond and bitter memories 41 years later.
